# Dive Log Web Application
This is a modern dive log web application built with Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Azure Cosmos DB.

## Features
- User Management
- Dive Log Management  
- Equipment Management
- Dive Site Management
- Media Management
- User Forum
- User Blogs and Articles
- Social Features (Friends, Messaging)
- Notifications System
- Search and Filtering
- Authentication and Authorization
- Responsive Design

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 15+ with TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- Azure Cosmos DB for data storage
- Modern authentication system
- Responsive design for all devices

## Development Guidelines
- Follow TypeScript best practices
- Use proper component structure with separation of concerns
- Implement proper error handling and validation
- Use Azure Cosmos DB best practices for data modeling
- Ensure responsive design across devices
